Entry into Canada

1. Sep 2014

Finally I managed to publish this post! A big THANK YOU to those of you patiently waiting. My voyage here was a little adventure. It all started at Hamburg airport from where I was taking the flight to Munich and from there to Toronto!
It took nine hours to get to Toronto and it was a smooth flight! However with my arrival in Toronto trouble startet!

Well prepared

24. Aug 2014

During the last two weeks I were at the preparation seminar for my “Volutary Year Abroad”! The seminar definitely overcame my expectations!

finniweb is online

10. Aug 2014

Finally the coding is done and the blog is ready for action!
I will continue to upgrade the website by adding features you’re hopefully not missing until they are there…!

Since I’m going to visit the (lets call it) preparation camp for my social year on Tuesday it is just in time!
